description: 学习there be句型的基础用法：表示某处有某物或某人

explanation.basic_structure: There + be + 名词 + 地点状语
basic_rules: there be句型表示某处有某物或某人
There is + 单数名词 + 地点
There are + 复数名词 + 地点
be动词要与后面的名词保持一致
usage_cases: 表示存在：There is a book on the desk.
表示位置：There are many students in the classroom.
表示数量：There is some water in the bottle.
表示时间：There was a party yesterday.
common_errors: There have a book on the desk. (错误) → There is a book on the desk. (正确)
There are a book on the desk. (错误) → There is a book on the desk. (正确)
There is many books on the desk. (错误) → There are many books on the desk. (正确)
usage_tips: there be句型表示存在，不是拥有
be动词要与后面的名词保持一致

present_singular: There is a book on the desk.
There is a cat in the garden.
There is some water in the bottle.
There is a student in the classroom.
There is a car in the garage.
present_plural: There are many books on the desk.
There are some cats in the garden.
There are many students in the classroom.
There are some cars in the garage.
There are two apples on the table.
sentences: There is a book on the desk.
There are many students in the classroom.
There is some water in the bottle.
There are two apples on the table.

assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解there be句型基本用法，需要加强练习
